Description.0: 25 decks in the Saucer, 5 in the neck, 10 in the main hull.
Description.1: The large saucer houses most ship systems with the main hull only hosing the deflector.
Description.2: The nacelles are mounted about half way up the saucer and are angled down so the nacelle itself is parallel with the saucer edge.
Description.3: From above the secondary hull cannot be seen.
